name: MeaslesTestsForMeaslesVirusIgGAntibodyRatioInSerum
title: Measles (Tests for measles virus IgG Antibody [Ratio] in Serum)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Measles virus IgG antibody (ratio between 1st and 2nd specimen) in serum),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Measles IgG Ab ratio

LOINC search: "Measles IgG Ab ratio -panel serum -rubella"),(Exclusion Criteria: None)

concept.display: Measles virus IgG Ab [Ratio] in Serum --1st specimen/2nd specimen

contains.display: Measles virus IgG Ab [Ratio] in Serum --1st specimen/2nd specimen
